sentences.english: The cliff debris subgrade is a special type of subgrade in mountainous highway construction.
sentences.chinese: 岩堆路基是山区公路建设中遇到的特殊路基形式。

sentences.english: The cliff debris subgrade is a special type of subgrade in mountainous highway construction.
sentences.chinese: 岩堆路基是山区公路建设中遇到的特殊路基形式。

sentences.english: The process of subgrade drainage and railway-use land design is related with cross section design directly.
sentences.chinese: 路基排水用地设计与横断面设计成果直接相关。

sentences.english: The problem of improved soil is important for high-speed railway subgrade.
sentences.chinese: 改良土问题是高速铁路路基的重要内容。

sentences.english: Road bed is the subgrade on which are laid the ballast, ties and rails.
sentences.chinese: 路基就是上面铺着道渣，枕轨和钢轨的底基。

sentences.english: The slaked area was related to the loess density, small density of subgrade loess resulted in large slaking scope.
sentences.chinese: 比较大的湿软区域易导致路基路面病害。

sentences.english: By-product materials like lime kiln dust (LKD), cement kiln dust, and fly ash are usually used to modify pavement subgrades.
sentences.chinese: 石灰炉渣和水泥炉渣常用于加固路基土。

sentences.english: The roadbed of a 300-metre section rail in Qianjiang city collapsed on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，潜江市300米长的铁路路基塌陷。

sentences.english: The result indicates embankment berm on permafrost region should not be regarded as the main measure to improve thermal stability of embankment.
sentences.chinese: 冻土路基护道不应作为提高路基热稳定性的主要措施。

sentences.english: The result indicates embankment berm on permafrost region should not be regarded as the main measure to improve thermal stability of embankment.
sentences.chinese: 冻土路基护道不应作为提高路基热稳定性的主要措施。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the selection of consolidation options of wet weak subgrade in the light of the project example.
sentences.chinese: 本文结合工程实例介绍了湿软路基加固方案的选择。

sentences.english: The earthquake made the roadbed cave in.
The capillary ascension of ground water in the saline ground will cause a series of embankment defects.
sentences.chinese: 盐渍土地区地下水的毛管上升能引起一系列路基病害。

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of highway construction is fill root out the road over the high embankment.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路建设的特点之一就是路基高填深挖路段多。

sentences.english: Thus, the problem of efficiently finding the basic set of directed circuits in a digraph is solved.
sentences.chinese: 从而解决了求有向回路基集的有效算法问题。

definition: (civil engineering) cutting (for a railway or highway)
Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
